this_title: The Real Housewives of Potomac Season 2
trans_title: 波托马克娇妻 第二季
introduction: Gizelle and Charrisse's friendship hangs in the balance following Gizelle's shocking accusation about Charrisse. When the two ladies finally get together to talk, all bets are off! Ashley's involvement in a new charity threatens her responsibilities to her and Michael's restaurant. Robyn and Juan adjust to their new lives, while Karen and Ray butt heads.
chinese_title: 波托马克娇妻 第二季
foreign_title: The Real Housewives of Potomac Season 2
